p.k: Western with Robert Mitchum. In 1880s northern California, an isolated, dysfunctional family's lives change forever when a mountain lion starts prowling around their ranch
World War II drama starring John Wayne - in his first ever war film - as one of the US pilots who helped to defend China from invading Japanese troops
Western starring Charles Coburn, Sigrid Gurie and John Wayne. An Austrian doctor and his daughter flee the Nazis to America, before a natural disaster
Second World War drama. Kenneth More stars as the British captain charged with finding and destroying the Bismarck, Germany's largest battleship
Cheeky comedy sequel starring Anna Kendrick, Rebel Wilson and Hailee Steinfeld. Can the Barden Bellas redeem themselves after a very embarrassing incident?
Action comedy. Arnold Schwarzenegger stars as an iron-jawed, iron-willed cop from behind the Iron Curtain, partnered with an American who he considers
Sci-fi horror-comedy with Jodie Whittaker and John Boyega. Aliens unwisely pick a tough London housing estate as the 'beachhead' for their invasion
Action-comedy with Mark Wahlberg, Dwayne Johnson and Anthony Mackie. Three bodybuilders become killers. Brutal violence/very strong language and sexual
